mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (course_code, course_name, credits, department, description, is_active) VALUES (#{courseCode}, #{courseName}, #{credits}, #{department}, #{description}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credits, c.department, c.description, c.is_active, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM courses c INNER JOIN teacher_courses tc ON c.id = tc.course_id WHERE tc.teacher_id = #{teacherId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
